<template>
  <b-navbar toggleable="md" type="light" variant="light">
    <b-navbar-brand href="#" @click="setCurrentChallenge('')">VAST</b-navbar-brand>
    <b-navbar-toggle target="navbarNav"></b-navbar-toggle>
    <b-collapse id="navbarNav" is-nav>
      <b-navbar-nav class="ml-auto">
        <b-nav-item
          :class="{'challenge-button': true, 'challenge2': currentChallenge === 'Challenge2'}"
          @mouseover="setHoveredChallenge('Challenge2')"
          @mouseleave="clearHoveredChallenge"
          @click="setCurrentChallenge('Challenge2')"
        >
          Challenge 2
        </b-nav-item>
        <b-nav-item
          :class="{'challenge-button': true, 'challenge3': currentChallenge === 'Challenge3'}"
          @mouseover="setHoveredChallenge('Challenge3')"
          @mouseleave="clearHoveredChallenge"
          @click="setCurrentChallenge('Challenge3')"
        >
          Challenge 3
        </b-nav-item>
      </b-navbar-nav>
    </b-collapse>
  </b-navbar>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  // eslint-disable-next-line vue/multi-word-component-names
  name: 'Header',
  data() {
    return {
      currentChallenge: '',
      hoveredChallenge: '',
    };
  },
  methods: {
    setCurrentChallenge(challenge) {
      this.currentChallenge = challenge;
    },
    setHoveredChallenge(challenge) {
      this.hoveredChallenge = challenge;
    },
    clearHoveredChallenge() {
      this.hoveredChallenge = '';
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style>
nav {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.challenge-button {
  transition: background-color 0.3s, color 0.3s;
}

.challenge2 {
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 0.5);
  color: white;
}

.challenge3 {
  background-color: rgba(255, 0, 255, 0.5);
  color: white;
}

.challenge2:hover,
.challenge2.active {
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1);
}

.challenge3:hover,
.challenge3.active {
  background-color: rgba(255, 0, 255, 1);
}
</style>
